Description: Lower body and conical foot sherd of Chian early patterned or Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black; exterior: slip mostly worn; reserved; outside of foot glazed, underside reserved; inscription on underside.
Bibliographic references: Johnston 2006a / Trademarks on Greek Vases: Addenda (p. 171, no. 65)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0343) (phase 2)
